meta.title: Science Projects Hub
meta.description: A curated collection of unique science project ideas spanning multiple disciplines
meta.author: Science Hub

projects.title: Mycelium Network Communication
projects.description: Investigate how fungal networks transmit electrical signals between plants. Map the underground 'wood wide web' using microelectrodes and signal amplifiers.
projects.hypothesis: Mycelium networks transmit stress signals between host plants within measurable electrical pulses.

projects.title: Sonoluminescence at Home
projects.description: Create light from sound by collapsing microscopic bubbles in water using ultrasonic transducers. Observe plasma formation at room temperature.
projects.hypothesis: Acoustic cavitation produces measurable photon emission detectable with consumer camera equipment.

projects.title: Bacterial Biofuel Cell
projects.description: Engineer a microbial fuel cell using Geobacter bacteria to convert organic waste into electricity. Optimize electrode materials for maximum power density.
projects.hypothesis: Carbon nanotube-modified anodes increase power output by 40% over plain graphite electrodes.

projects.title: Exoplanet Transit Simulation
projects.description: Build a light-curve detection apparatus that simulates how astronomers find exoplanets. Use a light sensor and model stars to measure dips in brightness.
projects.hypothesis: Planet diameter correlates linearly with percentage light drop, matching NASA Kepler mission equations.

projects.title: Microplastic Bioaccumulation Study
projects.description: Track how microplastics (< 5mm) accumulate in aquatic food chains using fluorescent-tagged particles and Daphnia as model organisms.
projects.hypothesis: Microplastic concentration increases 10x per trophic level in a simplified aquatic food chain.

projects.title: Optogenetics Light-Response Model
projects.description: Model optogenetic neuron firing using LED-controlled ion channels in a synthetic lipid bilayer. Measure membrane potential changes with precision electrodes.
projects.hypothesis: 473nm blue light pulses induce repeatable, measurable depolarization events in synthetic membranes.

projects.title: Quantum Eraser Experiment
projects.description: Recreate the delayed-choice quantum eraser using polarized light and a double-slit setup. Observe interference patterns disappear and reappear based on measurement.
projects.hypothesis: Marking which-path information destroys interference fringes; erasing that information restores them.

projects.title: CRISPR Visualization Model
projects.description: Build a 3D physical model of the CRISPR-Cas9 molecular scissors using everyday materials. Demonstrate guide RNA targeting and DNA cleavage mechanism.
projects.hypothesis: Physical modeling of CRISPR mechanism improves conceptual understanding vs. diagram-only teaching.

projects.title: Ferrofluid Magnetic Memory
projects.description: Synthesize iron oxide ferrofluid nanoparticles and demonstrate magnetic domain switching to model binary data storage principles.
projects.hypothesis: Home-synthesized ferrofluid nanoparticles exhibit superparamagnetic behavior identical to commercial samples.

projects.title: Dark Sky Light Pollution Map
projects.description: Map local light pollution using a Sky Quality Meter built from a TSL2561 sensor. Correlate readings with star count visibility and urban density.
projects.hypothesis: Light pollution reduces visible star count by 85% in urban cores vs. rural sites within 50km.

projects.title: EEG Brainwave Entrainment
projects.description: Use a consumer EEG headset to measure brainwave frequency shifts in response to binaural beats. Analyze alpha, beta, and theta wave dominance.
projects.hypothesis: 40Hz binaural beats shift EEG power spectrum toward gamma frequencies within 5 minutes of exposure.

projects.title: Thermoelectric Forest Sensor
projects.description: Harvest energy from the temperature differential between forest floor and canopy to power a wireless sensor network monitoring biodiversity.
